name: The Waiting Game HD Remaster
description: The Waiting Game is a time-wasting simulator. Earn points by tapping on a virtual desk. There are no time limits. The only enemy is your own patience. Achieve combos and earn upgrades (mostly just a nicer desk to tap on). You must balance speed, accuracy and endurance if you want to become the TAPPING MASTER and eventually reach TRANSCENDENCE. The game was originally released in 2012. Now, 8 years later, this new version for 2020 is a reboot, remake, and remaster. The graphics have been overhauled. The visual effects have been rendered in higher fidelity. But the gameplay remains the same. Time may pass, but time wasting is forever.
